about_the_game:
Embark on an extraordinary journey beyond the seven wonders of the world with the "Maze of Realities: Ride in the Sky DLC." This thrilling expansion takes your gaming experience to new heights, introducing exclusive and intriguing bonus chapters to each episode of the game. Get ready to unlock additional locations, unravel mysteries, and uncover answers to the unknown as you immerse yourself even further into the captivating world and atmosphere of the Maze of Realities!

The "Ride in the Sky DLC" invites you to journey to the remote Egyptian temple of Abu Gorab, but we're not talking about the ancient sandy ruins. This is about what archaeologists have unearthed at this enigmatic location and the inexplicable events that have befallen them!

🌌 EXPERIENCE BEING A HEALER!
Help the turtle in the sacred lagoon heal from the ailment! You know how to make the cure, don't you?

🌌 FIND AIDAN'S BOOK!
Visit Aiden's library, where you will have to solve a difficult puzzle to find a very valuable book.

🌌 SEARCH FOR INFORMATION ABOUT THE SPELL!
It used to be thought that it was impossible to break the spell on the enchanted, but it seems Clarissa has found a way!

🌌 CHECK OUT MELISSA'S JOURNAL!
Explore an encrypted journal about research on turtle diseases. But first, you'll have to decrypt it, of course.
